Like new 2021 Volkswagen T-Cross 1.5 TSi R-Line with 23,000km and full Volkswagen service history.

Balance of 45,000km/ 3 year service plan (May 2024) and 120,000km/ 3 year warranty (May 2024)

Reverse camera, park distance control, smash and grab window tinting, Bluetooth, auto headlights, cruise control, multi functional steering wheel, keyless entry, keyless stop/start, digital cockpit etc. etc.

R429,995. Finance available. Call Devon at Pengelly Autos 0217011986 or 0825364216 anytime. Pengelly Autos hand pick their vehicles, only buying from the owner. We do not buy from auctions, repos etc. We are a financial service provider (FSP no: 22186). Situated at 292 Main Rd, Tokai. We offer finance through all the major banks as well as offering extended warranties, insurance etc. We also accept trade ins. Website www.pengellyautos.co.za To apply for finance, please click on the finance tab on our website.
